# Simple Container

> Simple Container offers high-level primitives for quick and easy setup of integration and delivery pipelines for microservice applications. Scale from startup to enterprise with 500x faster onboarding and 70% cost reduction.

Simple Container provides container-native DevOps practices with a separation of concerns philosophy: DevOps manages infrastructure once in parent stacks, developers deploy self-service with simple client configurations. Supports AWS ECS Fargate, Google Cloud GKE Autopilot, and pure Kubernetes deployments.

## Home

- [Home](docs/index.md): Overview of Home

## AI Assistant

AI-powered project onboarding and configuration assistant

- [AI Assistant Overview](docs/ai-assistant/index.md): Overview of AI Assistant
- [Getting Started](docs/ai-assistant/getting-started.md): Quick setup guide for AI assistant features
- [Developer Mode](docs/ai-assistant/developer-mode.md): Application team workflows for generating client configs
- [DevOps Mode](docs/ai-assistant/devops-mode.md): Infrastructure team workflows for server configs
- [Commands Reference](docs/ai-assistant/commands.md): Complete command documentation
- [MCP Integration](docs/ai-assistant/mcp-integration.md): Model Context Protocol integration for IDE tools like Windsurf and Cursor
- [Template Requirements](docs/ai-assistant/templates-config-requirements.md): Template configuration requirements and validation rules
- [Troubleshooting](docs/ai-assistant/troubleshooting.md): Common issues and solutions
- [Usage Examples](docs/ai-assistant/usage-examples.md): Real-world usage examples and workflows
